channel.title: gem on Mike Ball
channel.description: Recent content in gem on Mike Ball

item.title: wp2middleman
item.description: wp2middleman is a Ruby gem that migrates the Wordpress posts in a Wordpress XML export file to middleman-style markdown files. wp2middleman provides a wp2mm commandline executable, as well as a WP2Middleman module. View source and documentation on Github »

item.title: Lobber
item.description: Lobber is a simple command line utility used to quickly upload a directory to Amazon S3. Lobber is built with Ruby and can be downloaded from Rubygems. View its source code on GitHub »

item.title: Using the phl_geocode Ruby Gem
item.description: I recently released phl_geocode, a simple Ruby gem which gets latitude and longitude coordinates for a Philadelphia address. Getting Started Install phl_geocode: gem install phl_geocode Require phl_geocode: require "phl_geocode" Instantiate a PHLGeocode instance: phl = PHLGeocode.new Get latitude/longitude coordinates for a Philadelphia address: phl.get_coordinates "1500 market street" Example response: [{ :address => "1500 MARKET ST", :similarity => 100, :latitude => 39.
